import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Navbar,Nav,Button,Form,FormControl, Container,Jumbotron,NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import {searchArticle} from './../actions/articleAction' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { strings } from "../localization/string" class Menu extends Component { changeLanguage = (lang)=>{ strings.setLanguage(lang); this.props.language(lang); this.setState({}); } render() { return (

) } } const mtp = (store)=>{ return { articles: store.articleR.articles } } export default connect(mtp, {searchArticle})(Menu)
